channel.title: Help needed
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:145) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:58) Press any key to continue . . .
How the fuck should i fix it? please say everything in noob terms. :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

It’s because you don’t have 1 tab space for each section

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Whaitas:

idk what theese buy sell does

It’s how the items are treated.
I can’t remember exactly what all they do.
But like if the buy option is set to 1, you can only buy what the shop sells.
And same if you set the sell option to 1. You can only sell what the shop buys.
(this may be wrong).
It’s something like that though.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Whaitas Whaitas
item.description:
@Whaitas wrote:

idk what theese buy sell does
can you explain me ?
also. can i have your skype so i could contact you faster? :3

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Whaitas, post:3, topic:543136”]Thank you was about to give up
BTW:
i dont think theres a problem in this text file? or im just too noob to do this? i want to do everything perfectly :3 but i suck :d :palm:
http://oi59.tinypic.com/2rpqybo.jpg[/quote]
It’s a .cfg, not a .txt (text editors can read em). but that isn’t important.

Just because it doesn’t >look< like there’s no issue, there still could be.
I personally don’t know how your shop system works on your server, but mine had it:
shop(space)=(tab)Shop_name_here(tab)buyType(tab)sellType(tab)itemID(tab)amount
I know that looks funky above, but here’s an example: (I might have buy and sell type mixed)
shop = 0 General_Store 1 1 1034 500 1048 500 1050 500
Obviously I have more than one item in the shop, but you get the gist. I hope

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

One of your shops has an extra tab or space. in the shop.cfg go to the most recent one you edited and make sure they are tabbed/spaced correctly.

Read full topic
